<JD_START>
Job Title: Sales Manager

Location: Mount Pleasant, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Job Overview

The Sales Manager will be responsible for the retention and expansion of business unit accounts by leveraging our comprehensive hauling solutions for the professional grade (Pro Grade) trailer market. This will be accomplished by leading the sales team in building strong relationships with business unit accounts, helping the team grow their business by actively promoting and communicating the brand value proposition. Partner with internal cross functional teams to ensure a “best in class” customer experience. Teach, coach, train and hold the team accountable to the sales organization goals and metrics.

Job Responsibilities

 Work directly with sales team to ensure exceptional customer experience, ensuring growth of brand positioning within these accounts.  Coach, train and develop team while holding accountable to behaviors and results.  Ensuring proper account pipeline management including end to end order fulfillment.  Grow accounts through sales team by providing technical assistance, monitoring customer activity and inventory movement, evaluating our position relative to the overall business, and establishing a professional rapport with customers.  Ensure sales team meet or exceed customer touch point cadences.  Develop new customer accounts upon acquisition based upon account assignment.  Promoting changes in products and value propositions by evaluating results and competitive developments; assisting with determining the cost effectiveness of implementing new products and product price points.  Train sales team on our products, their use and competitive features and functions within the marketplace.  Leverage ERP, CRM & Business Intelligence management tools to drive effectiveness of sales activities.  Work with cross functional teams to ensure growth and customer experience goals are achieved.  Monitor accurate Monthly, Quarterly and Annual Sales performance to targets by defined book of business.  Additional duties, as necessary. 

Competencies

 Leadership / Team Development  Sales and Goal Driven  Communication  Build Relationships  Product and Industry Expertise  Strategic Thinker  Self-Motivated 

Key Accountabilities

 Individual and Team Sales and Market Share Results  Business Goal Attainment  Customer retention  Business Unit Pipeline Management  New Account Development  Customer Experience  Representation of the business brands  Execution of Value Propositions and Promotions 

Education – Experience Required

 Management and team building experience.  Detail orientated, customer focus, information seeking, willingness to learn, enjoy fast paced team environment.  Excellent communication and interpersonal skills with aptitude for building strong client relationships  Preferred account management experience in a B2B environment  Strong negotiation skills with a problem-solving attitude  Proficient with Microsoft Office  Bachelor's Degree in Business or related field  3+ years of supervisory or management experience  5+ years of sales experience  5+ years of equipment experience  Less than 30% travel with occasional overnight stays 

Physical Demands

 Talk and hear, read, write understand and communicate by telephone.  The employee is frequently required to use hands for typing, 10-key operation, telephone dialing. Regular use of hands for feeling, grasping, or manipulating objects, tools, or controls. Occasional using hands and arms in handling, installing, positioning, and moving materials, and manipulating things.  Specific vision abilities required for this job include close vision, distance vision, peripheral vision, depth perception, and the ability to adjust focus.  The employee is regularly required to sit, stand, walk, occasionally required to climb, or balance, and stoop, kneel, crouch or crawl, move over uneven surfaces.  Employee may occasionally have to lift items up to 50lbs. 

IND123

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
<JD_END>
